mapper.insert: INSERT INTO species (common_name, scientific_name, conservation_statuses_id, families_id) VALUES (#{commonName}, #{scientificName}, #{conservationStatus.id}, #{family.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE species SET common_name = #{commonName}, scientific_name = #{scientificName}, conservation_statuses_id = #{conservationStatus.id}, families_id = #{family.id} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS species_id, s.common_name, s.scientific_name, f.name AS family_name, cs.status AS conservation_status, i.url AS image_url, h.name AS habitat_name, c.name AS characteristic_name FROM species.species AS s JOIN species.families AS f ON s.families_id = f.id JOIN species.conservation_statuses AS cs ON s.conservation_statuses_id = cs.id LEFT JOIN species.species_images AS si ON s.id = si.species_species_id LEFT JOIN species.images AS i ON si.image_id = i.id LEFT JOIN species.species_locations AS sl ON s.id = sl.species LEFT JOIN species.locations AS l ON sl.location_id = l.id LEFT JOIN species.habitats AS h ON l.habitats_id = h.id LEFT JOIN species.species_characteristics AS sc ON s.id = sc.species_id LEFT JOIN species.characteristics AS c ON sc.characteristic_id = c.id JOIN species.species_references AS sr ON s.id = sr.species_id JOIN species.references AS r ON sr.reference_id = r.id
